column13:
Mineral Fusion Mineral Shampoo - Imported (250 ml) Price: Rs.2100

Mineral Fusion Mineral Shampoo Lasting Color 8. 5 fl oz (250 ml). Revitalizing Minerals naturally promote healthy radiant hair. Extra-gentle cleansers remove impurities without stripping color Zinc helps defend against color fade Panthenol and Vitamin E enhance shineTest demonstrate the use of our Lasting Color line boosts the longevity of color-treated hair by up to 18% decreasing the frequency at which hair needs to be re-colored. Harsh cleansers and exposure to the sun and outdoors strip color and cause fading. to combat these elements this shampoo provides:Botanical emollients to boost shine and detangle hair. Zinc Oxide to help block the sun s rays defending against color fade. Copper Manganese and Iron to help nourish and protect the hair and scalp. Panthenol and Vitamin E to help enhance shine. Formula Purity100% vegetarian and vegan no animal testing biodegradable and free of parabens gluten phthalates SLS artificial fragrances and colors. Made in USA
